kpi.name: M1006C205

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN REJECT DUE TO CENTRALIZED UNIT OVERLOAD
kpi_info.use: "The number of RRC connection rejections due to centralized signalling unit RSMU overload. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC CONNECTION REJECT message to the UE because RSMU unit is overloaded. Also M1006C21 is updated along with this counter."

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN REJECT DUE TO CENTRALIZED UNIT OVERLOAD
